data.title: New York Women's Foundation
data.meta_description: Advancing an equitable and just future for all women and girls. The New York Women’s Foundation is a platform for women (cis and trans), non-binary and gender-expansive people, and a force for change. Solutions By and For Community The organizations we invest in are as diverse and varied as the communities in which they originate. Our community […]
data.text:
Current Grantee Partners New York Abortion Access Fund

The New York Abortion Access Fund (NYAAF) supports anyone who needs assistance paying for an abortion in New York State, or for New Yorkers seeking care elsewhere. They are continuing to ramp up their efforts to maintain and expand abortion access in a post-Roe world.

Current Grantee Partners If/When/How: Lawyering for Reproductive Justice

If/When/How transforms the law and policy landscape through advocacy, support, and organizing so all people have the power to determine if, when, and how to define, create, and sustain families with dignity and to actualize sexual and reproductive wellbeing on their own terms.

Current Grantee Partners Black Women’s Blueprint

Founded by survivors for survivors, Black Women’s Blueprint is on a mission to provide services and spaces for healing, reconciliation, and human connection with the natural world. In 2020, the collective founded Restore Forward, a 300-acre reconciliation center and Holistic Living Lab offering intentional land stewardship, farming, healing, and educational workshops.
